document.full_text: police searched the home of charlie sheen on thursday looking for firearms that would have violated a court order against him, but they found only bullets and an antique rifle, a lawyer for the actor said.
document.title: police search home of charlie sheen
lines_and_colors: police searched the home of charlie sheen on thursday looking for firearms that would have violated a court order against him, but they found only bullets and an antique rifle, a lawyer for the actor said.
